entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
